description: Enjoy stunning inlet and ocean views from every room on the top two floors, including the spacious sundeck. Completely taken down to the studs and professionally rebuilt, this home offers an all-new white kitchen with stone countertops, S/S undermount sink, built-in pot filler, and high-quality S/S appliances fridge with ice and water. Both bathrooms are fully renovated, featuring a convenient 2-pc on the main and a beautifully finished 3-pc upstairs with a walk-in glass shower. New vinyl windows and doors allow natural light to pour into this bright east-facing inlet-view home. The lower level provides outstanding flexibilityâ€”perfect for a home theatre, sports fan hangout, or private office. Close to Burnaby for easy commuting and ideal for families with loads of kids & indoor pool.
